nodes.text: Harken was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto commander stationed on Corellia in 3640 BBY, when he was killed.

Harken appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Corellia. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of an achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
